Text: It says the file is corrupt. Was that just for me?
@Maxxxima on TPB people don't really comment on a DLC or RGH torrent, cuz they always work, plus they have seeds not more than 10 or 12 so this one definitely works, judging by the no. of seeds.
well you do get some comments from time to time, they're usually by someone with a retail 360 saying "How can I play this on my Xbox 360 plz?"

@jakedilla I get you bro... I tried alot to get mine working and non of the ways worked so i got this freaky software "DLCXplorer" from a random guy over a random forum, i cant find it anywhere else lemme post it here if anyone needs it
